[B][color=red]Please note:-
==============[/color]

These 720p epsides are webrips and as such are numbered by production code rather than air date. 
The 1st few epsiodes are in a different order from the SD releases, 
this is not a mistake, it is how they are numbered for digital release.[/B]

I have 19 of these 720p copies so far and will upload them all over the next week or so

======================================

Synopsis
---------

# Title Director(s) Writer(s) Original air date Production code 
-:-----:----------: -------- :-----------------:---------------

5 "Hulk vs the World" Sebastian Montes Kevin Burke & Chris Wyatt  October 24, 2010 (2010-10-24) 003


Bruce Banner confronts the Absorbing Man causing him to transform into the Incredible Hulk.
S.H.I.E.L.D.'s Hulkbusters join the Absorbing Man in the battle to take down the Incredible Hulk. 
Hawkeye and Black Widow take on the Hulk.
Hawkeye becomes suspicious of the Black Widow. 

Introducing characters: 

 Hulk, Thunderbolt Ross, Absorbing Man, 
Hawkeye, Black Widow, Hulkbusters, 
Abomination, Bobbi Morse, Doc Samson, Bi-Beast, 
U-Foes (Vector, Ironclad, Vapor, X-Ray), Leader, Madman, Radioactive Man 

Spoken Language:- English
